+++ b/source/lib/ldb/configure.ac	2007-04-30 09:08:13 +0000

 AC_DEFUN([SMB_LIBRARY_ENABLE], [echo -n ""])
 AC_DEFUN([SMB_EXT_LIB], [echo -n ""])
 AC_DEFUN([SMB_ENABLE], [echo -n ""])

=== modified file 'source/lib/tdb/configure.ac'
